name: Indeed
description: Indeed, the world’s #1 job site, connects millions of job seekers and employers globally. With over 350 million monthly visitors, it offers job searches, resume posting, and company research in 60+ countries. Powered by AI, Indeed helps over 3 million employers find and hire new talent, making job matching and hiring efficient and effective.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Let’s rebuild the world of work, together. You're here to hire. We're here to help.

Highlights.name: Free Service
Highlights.description: Indeed is a free platform which makes it accessible for everyone and removes a financial barrier for job searching and recruitment.

Highlights.name: Advanced Search
Highlights.description: Indeed offers powerful search filters that allow job seekers to refine their search by industry, location, company size, salary range, and even specific skills.

Highlights.name: Mobile App
Highlights.description: Indeed's mobile app provides a convenient way for job seekers to search for jobs, manage applications, and receive job alerts on the go.

enhanced_description: Indeed, recognized as the world’s #1 job site, serves as a global connector for millions of job seekers and employers across more than 60 countries. Boasting over 350 million unique monthly visitors and a vast database of 245 million resumes, it empowers over 3 million employers to efficiently find and hire new talent. Leveraging advanced AI, Indeed streamlines job matching and hiring processes, complemented by features like over 940 million total ratings and reviews, powerful advanced search filters (by industry, location, company size, salary, skills), a convenient mobile app, and a fundamental free service component designed to facilitate job searching and recruitment.
competitive_advantages: Global market leadership and reach (#1 job site in 60+ countries)
Massive user base (350M+ monthly visitors, 245M resumes)
AI-powered job matching and hiring efficiency
Accessibility with a free service component (for job seekers and basic employer functions)
Convenient mobile application for on-the-go access
roi_benefits: Access to a vast and diverse talent pool
Reduced recruitment costs (due to free service options and efficiency gains)
scalability_features: Global reach and operations across 60+ countries
Support for 350M+ monthly visitors and 3M+ employers
Designed to support small, medium, large, and global enterprises
